oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Participatory Guarantee Systems (PGS. How PGS can intensify knowledge exchange between farmers
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kirchner, Cornelia
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Education, extension and communication
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Participatory Guarantee Systems have shown to hold great potential to encourage knowledge exchange between farmers. A study conducted among PGS initiatives from all continents combines quantitative (questionnaire) and qualitative (in-depth interview) research and explores practices of knowledge exchange between farmers involved in PGS.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kirchner, Cornelia (2014) Participatory Guarantee Systems (PGS. How PGS can intensify knowledge exchange between farmers. Paper at: IFOAM Organic World Congress 2014, Istanbul, Turkey, 13-15 October 2014. [Completed]
